guide.introduction: Watch the video on CRAFT! Upcycled accessories are fun and easy to make. Watch and learn how to make your own chain-link headband from a busted bicycle inner tube! I got this project idea from Britt McMaster, who showed us how to make a chain-link necklace from white leather over on her blog, cucumbersome.com.
guide.introduction_rendered:
Watch the video on CRAFT! Upcycled accessories are fun and easy to make. Watch and learn how to make your own chain-link headband from a busted bicycle inner tube! I got this project idea from Britt McMaster, who showed us how to make a chain-link necklace from white leather over on her blog, cucumbersome.com.

Tools
  • Pen
  • Scissors
  • Sewing needle
  • Thread

lines.text: Cut off the tube's valve stem and slice down one side to open the tube.
lines.text_raw: Cut off the tube's valve stem and slice down one side to open the tube.

lines.text: Wash out the white powder inside the tube with soap and water. An abrasive sponge may help!
lines.text_raw: Wash out the white powder inside the tube with soap and water. An abrasive sponge may help!

lines.text: Watch out for goo tubes! If you live in a prickly place, you may have tubes with goo in them. In my experience, it's not worth it to try to use goo tubes for this project.
lines.text_raw: Watch out for goo tubes! If you live in a prickly place, you may have tubes with goo in them. In my experience, it's not worth it to try to use goo tubes for this project.

lines.text: Print and cut out the paper/cardboard template.
lines.text_raw: Print and cut out the paper/cardboard template.

lines.text: Trace the template repeatedly along the length of the bike tube.
lines.text_raw: Trace the template repeatedly along the length of the bike tube.

lines.text: Cut out each shape until you've got a whole pile of "figure eights."
lines.text_raw: Cut out each shape until you've got a whole pile of "figure eights."

lines.text: Fold one shape in half so that the cutouts line up.
lines.text_raw: Fold one shape in half so that the cutouts line up.

lines.text: Insert another shape through the cutouts in the folded shape.
lines.text_raw: Insert another shape through the cutouts in the folded shape.

lines.text: Continue chaining shapes together in this manner until your desired length is achieved.
lines.text_raw: Continue chaining shapes together in this manner until your desired length is achieved.

lines.text: To create a seamless finish, cut the last folded loop in an inconspicuous spot, thread it through the first loop and sew the cut loop back together.
lines.text_raw: To create a seamless finish, cut the last folded loop in an inconspicuous spot, thread it through the first loop and sew the cut loop back together.

guide.summary: Turn a punctured bike inner tube into a fashionable accessory.
guide.title: Bike Tube Headband
